name: AssemblyAI
long_description: Today’s top Voice AI companies rely on AssemblyAI’s speech-to-text and speech understanding models to launch groundbreaking products fast and to scale with ease.
one_liner: The best way to build Voice AI apps

name: Volley
long_description:
Volley builds the best voice AI games and entertainment experiences for Amazon Alexa, smartphones, and TVs.

Popular Volley voice games include “Song Quiz”, “Jeopardy!”, and “The Price Is Right”.

Our voice apps are used by millions of people every month. We believe voice control will become the main way people access entertainment in their bedrooms, kitchens, living rooms, and cars, and our goal is to become the "Netflix of Voice" for this emerging category of devices.

Volley was founded by Max Child and James Wilsterman in 2016. We're a hybrid remote/in-person company, headquartered in San Francisco.
one_liner: Voice AI games on smart speakers, TVs, and mobile

name: BoldVoice
long_description: BoldVoice helps non-native English speakers to speak clearly and confidently. We combine bite-sized video lessons from Hollywood accent coaches with instant pronunciation feedback from AI, to create an effective and engaging learning experience.
one_liner: Speech and accent coaching app for non-native English speakers

name: Speechly
long_description:
Speechly makes it cost efficient to understand human conversations, in real-time. We do this by enabling high-accuracy spoken language understanding processed right on the end user’s device.

Hundreds of millions of hours of audio data are generated every single day online. Speechly is the first solution that can affordably turn this audio into actionable insights.
one_liner: Natural Language Understanding API for Speech that runs on device

name: voize
long_description:
At voize, we believe the greatest gift to frontline workers is time - time to care, connect, and be present. Today, that time is lost to admin work that pulls nurses away from what matters most: people. 

We’re changing that by building the AI companion that frees nurses from admin, giving them back up to 30% of time. We don’t replace humans - we support and amplify their impact. Today, 1,500+ care facilities trust voize, and over 100,000 nurses rely on our AI companion** to ease their daily workload.

Our mission is backed with a $50M Series A funding led by Balderton Capital, with support from HV Capital, Y Combinator and other leading VCs.
one_liner: We build the AI companion for nurses, to create time for care.

name: Uplift AI
long_description:
We build Voice Models for regional languages (like Urdu, Bengali, Greek etc) and make them available through simple APIs and SDKs. 
Developers use us to create Voice-first digital experiences (eg. Voice eCommerce, Voice Banking, Voice AI Tutors etc).

We gather our own data, develop our own labelling tools, train our own models, and design our own voice infra. This fully integrated approach enables us to offer the best models and the best developer experience for regional languages.

---

People who would previously never use certain digital services (like online ordering), actually use the service when they are given an intuitive Voice based interface.
We believe that Voice Interfaces will onboard 100s of millions of new users onto digital services; and double the addressable market for technology companies. 
Uplift AI will provide the best models to create these Voice Interfaces for 60% of the world's population that only speaks their regional language and represents 42 trillion dollars in GDP.
one_liner: Foundational Voice Models for regional languages
